title.rendered: MLB Player Prop Parlay for Friday, June 23rd

content.rendered:
Sports gambling can be a challenge, but luckily our experts have shown that they can find value in multiple different ways. Mason Folz, for example, loves to hammer MLB Player Props when he can’t decide on a total or a side. He dives deep into the stats and finds the best possible matchups for the day! Now, he has parlayed his three favorite pitching props, as he is looking to STRIKE OUT the books! We might not know who’s going to win, but we know that these players have GREAT matchups! Mason’s pick for Friday will payout at +508, so let’s take advantage today!

J.P. France Over 4.5 Strikeouts (-125)

The Dodgers haven’t impressed at the plate as of late and I think this is a real chance for France to dominate. Los Angeles is averaging 8.93 strikeouts per game and France has been a beast on the road this season. He is (2-1) with a 1.88 ERA and he has 22 Ks on the road. This number isn’t big enough, as he will pitch deep into this game and strike out just enough batters to push this strikeout total over the number (4.5).

Logan Webb Over 18.5 Outs Recorded (+100)

Logan Webb has been on an impressive streak, as his team has won four of his last five starts and he has pitched for at least seven innings in seven of his last nine starts. He has also been very tough to beat at home, as his ERA drops to 2.04 when he is playing in front of his home fans. He might have one tough inning, but I still see him recording enough outs to cover this total. Take Logan Webb to record more than (18.5) outs in this game against the Diamondbacks.

Patrick Sandoval Over 4.5 Strikeouts (-145)

I like Sandoval to record over (4.5) strikeouts in this one, as he has looked great in his last two starts. He has 14 combined strikeouts in 12 innings pitched and I believe he has a great matchup in this one. The Rockies have struggled against LHP all season and they are even worse on the road. The Rockies are also averaging 9.08 Ks per game, which is the 23rd least in the MLB. They will struggle again in this game and Sandoval will record just enough K’s to push his total over the number (4.5).

 

Mason wants you to know that finding these props is never easy and it takes a lot of work. But, boy is it worth it! Once your first one cashes, you’ll’ never look back! Winners and Whiners is locked and loaded with the handicappers that can lead you down the right path, and Mason Folz is one of the premier player prop bettors in the game! Ride with him and his MLB Player Props today and you won’t regret it!
